doc.name: revBrowserOpenCef
doc.summary: Opens and initialises a new Chrome-based browser.

example.p: put revBrowserOpenCef(the windowId of this stack, "http://www.runrev.com") into tBrowserId
if tBrowserId is not an integer then

description.overview: The revBrowserOpenCef function creates a new Chrome-baseed browser in the window with the given windowId. If a url is given, the browser immediately navigates to this url.

parameter.name: windowID
parameter.description: the operating system ID for a stack window as given by the stack windowID property.

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: the initial url to navigate to when opening the browser.

description.value: The revBrowserOpenCef function returns a value. If successful this will be an integer browser instance id, if unsuccessful, the result will be empty.
description.comments:
The revBrowserOpenCef function creates a new Chrome-baseed browser in the window with the given windowId. If a url is given, the browser immediately navigates to this url.
Example:
Create a new browser window in the current stack, set to open on the runrev homepage:
put revOpenBrowserCef(the windowId of this stack, "http://www.runrev.com") into tMyBrowserId
